reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: An exceptional professor with a deep understanding of algorithms. His lectures are clear and well-structured.

reviews.subject: Data Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable but her classes can be challenging. However, she is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: The content is difficult but Dr. Brown tries his best to make it understandable. His grading is fair.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Incredible professor with a passion for teaching. Her labs are very engaging and informative.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson’s lectures can be hard to follow. He often goes off on tangents, making it difficult to stay focused.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is a very good professor. Her explanations are clear, but her exams can be tricky.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: He knows the subject well, but his lectures can be monotonous at times. Be prepared to read a lot.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson makes literature come alive. Her discussions are always engaging and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: A very knowledgeable professor. He explains economic concepts clearly, but his classes move at a fast pace.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an amazing professor who deeply cares about her students. Her classes are both challenging and rewarding.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is very engaging in class. His assignments encourage deep thinking, but they can be quite difficult.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is knowledgeable but can be a bit unapproachable at times. Her lectures are well-organized though.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The material is difficult and Dr. Lewis does not explain it well. Be prepared to spend a lot of time studying on your own.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is passionate about psychology and it shows in her teaching. Her classes are always full of energy.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Young is very thorough and detailed in his explanations. However, his exams are very challenging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. King is an outstanding professor. Her ability to break down complex philosophical ideas is impressive.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be dry. However, he is very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Scott’s lectures are fascinating. She is passionate about art history, which makes her classes very interesting.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Green’s lectures are hard to follow and he does not provide much help outside of class. The exams are very tough.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is a brilliant professor who makes coding fun and understandable. Her projects are challenging but very rewarding.
